title: [UWP] BitmapDecoder.Properties.GetPropertiesAsync causes app window to hang indefinitely for web and heic images
body: Calling BitmapDecoder.Properties.GetPropertiesAsync (with any argument) cases the app window to hang indefinitely if the image the decoder is decoding is a webp or hiec image. Support for these has been added in Windows version 1809, which I am using and I'm also using the corresponding SDK version. Interestingly, the lower level WIC APIs are fine, and also the BitmapEncoder can set properties fine. Please can this bug be fixed?

comments.body: And just support HEIC/HEVC native please
